title: Technical Skills
subtitle: Comprehensive expertise across the Java ecosystem and beyond

content.paragraph1: Here's something I love about this industry: there's always something new to learn! I stay current with Java releases and framework updates, but I'm equally excited when a fellow developer shows me a clever approach I hadn't considered.
content.paragraph2: These days, I'm exploring how AI tools can become force multipliers for our team â€” not replacing our expertise, but freeing us up to tackle the really interesting challenges that require human insight and creativity.
